attributes.action: A petition to Scrap the tv license and turn it in to a subscription channel
attributes.additional_details:
The tv license needs to be scrapped there is no future for a forced tax on the nation.
The over 75s are forced to pay for something that is freely available in other countries.
attributes.background:
I want  parliament to look at the situation and future of the tv license fee, there is a call for the tv license fee to be scrapped and changed to a subscription fee , tv license is a forced tax on the nation.

I want the government to give the people of this country a right to vote.

departments.name: Department for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300118
